short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper tools for users of Artlogic, the fine art inventory system. Quickly download files and images for groups of records.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export multiple images from your Artlogic Database.

Follow this guide (https://support.artlogic.net/hc/en-gb/articles/360008576799-How-to-download-images-in-bulk) to learn how to download images and secondary images in various sizes.
